settings.label: Allow shopper to see prices in his own currency?

settings.content: Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.

settings.label: Currencies 1 icon
settings.info: Size: 16px x 11px

settings.label: Currencies 2 icon
settings.info: Size: 16px x 11px

settings.label: Currencies 3 icon
settings.info: Size: 16px x 11px

settings.label: Currencies 4 icon
settings.info: Size: 16px x 11px

settings.label: Currencies 5 icon
settings.info: Size: 16px x 11px

settings.content: Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: USD.

* For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://wiki.shopify.com/How_to_Show_Multiple_Currencies#Do_tell_where_the_money_is) (“Do tell where the money is”).
